title: New client: Disappearing panels.
body:
I just downloaded the new client, but when it loaded up, the login panel extended past the right side of my monitor, and when I moved the client window, it disappeared.
I eventually figured how to login.[don't move the window]
I got into a game lobby, but when I went to change my masteries, I couldn't find a way to confirm the masteries I chose. I couldn't exit the masteries panel with any key press and the game kicked me.

Will this be fixed???

replies.body: Does this happen only if you're editing a mastery page in champ select?

Unfortunately, I've been having the same bug. I don't think the bug is in the mastery pages, but in the disappearing panel. I've noticed that the client, after launch, will open to a resolution that is larger than my current monitor's (1024x768) This places the rightmost edge of the client (including the exit/options buttons and right half of the username/password entries). I know that it's an odd resolution, and I've had to deal with that for other games, i.e. play dark souls 3 in a pseudo-theater mode, but with the right side of the client closing with no way to open it up, this should be addressed. I tried to find an options menu to set the client at a new resolution, but i can't access it (it's on the right side of the client).

Thanks.

I'm confident it will be addressed, and this is the perfect time for these issues to happen since it's during the Open Beta and during the ranked pre-season. Since this issue is stemming from the client's scale, you should be able to alleviate this by resizing the client on the fly. You can do this by holding down **CTRL** and pressing the **-** key to reduce the size of the client. Alternatively, you can *increase* the size of the client by pressing the **+** key instead.

Let me know if this worked.
I had the same problem, and this worked. thank you! <3 {{champion:54}}

Same issue here. If i move the client or minimize than maximize it the right side with the login field will disappear. If i login successfully (without touching the client), if i move the client after that, the chat portion will disappear.

"You can [Ctrl] and [+]/[-]/[0] now to change the size of your client
cheers" I saw this somewhere and it helped me, i had the exact same problem :)
